text: "Shock the Monkey" is a 1982 song by English singer Peter Gabriel and is the second single from his fourth studio album Peter Gabriel (Security). It went to number 10 in Canada and was the first top 40 hit in the United States. It was a huge hit in Italy where it made number 2. ==Coal Chamber featuring Ozzy Osbourne version== "Shock the Monkey" was covered in 1999 by nu metal band Coal Chamber with Ozzy Osbourne on vocals. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Peter Gabriel songs Category:Ozzy Osbourne songs
title: Shock the Monkey
